Data.mob_completionText: Most excellent, this additional income will ensure that the city can continue to fund itself and the royal vault may remain sealed.

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Build a Centre of Camo Countermeasures building
Data.mob_completionText: Our scientists have done it again. Now we can research camo detection upgrades such as Dart Monkey's Enhanced Eyesight. Kapow! (There is no point in this since all towers have camo detection)
Now other Monkeys will think twice before attacking our city. And if they do, we'll be ready! At least we will be once our Bloontonium tanks are full...
We've now doubled our maximum cash capacity, that means we can now store twice as much City Cash. Music to my ears!

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Capture a Special Terrain tile. Special terrains display stars when tapped.
Data.mob_completionText: I don't need to hear tales of bravery or be told how difficult the challenge was. I just need to hear whether you discovered any unique treasure?
They may be small, but with this many our Dart Monkeys are a force to be reckoned with!
That's a whole lotta poppin' power and bang for buck!

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Raid another player's City with some Bloons.
Data.mob_completionText: The bloon raid is on its way. The results will be relayed to us soon!

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Raid $1000 City Cash from other players.
Data.mob_completionText: That should keep us going until I can convince the brass to increase our funding.
He's still mocking! In 140 characters or less he informed through Chimper that his city now has 41 squares of land.
The Gala has been cancelled under Royal Statute 732.1 - risk of Monkeys throwing things at parties. I no longer require the land and you may build freely upon it.

The Royal Gala was a huge success, city morale is at an all time high. I received an unexpected adrenaline rush from doing something nice but don't expect it to happen again. The extra squares are now free to build upon.
You actually did it! You found more treasure chests! Here's a reward for your troubles.

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Launch a Revenge Attack on another player after they have attacked you.
Data.mob_completionText: We should launch revenge attacks whenever anyone attacks our city. That will show them that we are not to be messed with!

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Unlock a Tier 4 Upgrade for one of your Monkey types.
Data.mob_completionText: Woah, yeah, that's the stuff! Those bloons will wish they'd never left the inflation factory!

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Build an Anti MOAB Research Lab.
Data.mob_completionText: Excellent! Now I can begin conducting my research into more powerful MOAB popping upgrades.

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Research the MOAB Mauler upgrade from Cannon Support building.
Data.mob_completionText: KABOOM, POW! That's more like it! MOAB class bloons will be much easier to take down now.
The epitome of awesome is now right on our doorstep. Our city's joined the big leagues. Time to bring a world of pain to any bloon who tries to stand in our way.
I've done it again! The city needed more income and I have delivered. There will be no stopping us from growing bigger and stronger now.

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Get the Multi-Target upgrade from Boomerang Institute.
Data.mob_completionText: A few minor adjustments go a long way and the popping power of our Boomerang Thrower's has increased dramatically.
Phew! That should buy us some time. As we continue to grow we must keep an eye on the power requirements to avoid this issue again in future.

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Reach 250 Power by building Windmills and/or Watermills.
Data.mob_completionText: Great job getting us that power. If only we had invested in surge protectors. Feel free to use the power for your city while we rebuild our slightly exploded computers.

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Get more power by upgrading a Windmill or Watermill.
Data.mob_completionText: It works! Well of course it does, I had every faith in my own abilities. We can now upgrade existing Windmills or Watermills if we need more power.

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Reach 1000 Power by building or upgrading Windmills and Watermills.
Data.mob_completionText: We did it! We unlocked the secret of the bloons! Unfortunately before we could save the data a lab assistant tripped over the power cable and we lost everything. The power has been re-routed to the city.
Excellent! I was right. The not quite completely harmless process will allow our Dart Monkeys to pop bloons from much further away.

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Capture some land by defeating a MOAB.
Data.mob_completionText: The bigger they are... the harder they fall! This will fill my trophy cabinet perfectly.

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Capture some land by defeating a BFB.
Data.mob_completionText: Wait 'til my friend get's a load of this. This BFB is taking pride of place in my entrance hall.

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Capture some land by defeating a ZOMG.
Data.mob_completionText: This baby is going right above the fireplace! Great work, soldier.

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Upgrade a Banana Farm to Bigger Plantation.
Data.mob_completionText: Sweet mother of City Cash, each Banana Farm can be upgraded to generate even more income. A truly groundbreaking revelation.

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Upgrade a Monkey Bank to Bigger Vaults.
Data.mob_completionText: With these bigger vaults we can store much more cash than before and the Banana Farmers can work harder than ever.
Fast Bloons are now available to send in Monkey v Monkey attacks. This is just the beginning of my creations. If I receive funding I can research even more powerful bloons.

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Research Heavy Bloon Armor from Bloon Research Lab.
Data.mob_completionText: The Lead Bloons are now fully tested and ready for deployment in our Monkey v Monkey attacks. I have recreated them faithfully, so be careful as they are heavy!

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Research Ceramic Bloon Construction from Bloon Research Lab.
Data.mob_completionText: After a few accidents in the lab I can now happily report that Ceramic Bloons are ready for full scale Monkey v Monkey deployment. Be careful not to drop them!
BOOM! HAHA! Music to my ears! Those bloons will think twice about attacking our town now that we have these babies! Good work, soldier.
Good work, that treasure will look perfect on top of all my other treasure. Keep an eye out for more of those chests on your travels.

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Capture 1 piece of land with four circles or higher.
Data.mob_completionText: Much better, I'm ready to go again. There's nothing like the smell of popped rubber in the morning.

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Build a Watermill on a river.
Data.mob_completionText: As a scientist I can scientifically conclude that water is running, wheels are spinning, and power is flowing.
With infinite range that sniper will mop up any bloons which manage to sneak by our initial defenses. That should help us claim more NLL bonuses.

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Build a Tack Shooter Storage Facility.
Data.mob_completionText: The Tack Shooters appear to have unique properties that no Monkey could replicate. Chalk this up as a successful experiment!
Suuuuuweeet! Now that we have an army of powerful bloon poppin' Monkeys, nothing can stand in our way.

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Capture 10 pieces of land that show ZOMG bloons on them.
Data.mob_completionText: Perfect, that should be enough. We'll take the remains of these popped ZOMG's back to the lab for experimentation.

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Capture some land by defeating a DDT.
Data.mob_completionText: I knew we could do it! But that's not going to be the last we see of the DDT's. We must continue to strengthen our defenses.
The techies back in the lab have never let us down and they nailed it again. The in game Banana Farms will provide a massive boost as we venture into tougher territories.
That's more like it! Now the bloons won't have anywhere to hide!
That's more like it! Now the bloons won't have anywhere to hide!

Data.mob_SubTaskDescription: Check out a friend's city after connecting with Facebook
Data.mob_completionText: Wow, that was awesome. Looks like we showed up at the right time and stopped those bloons in their tracks. Hopefully those guys will have our backs in future.

Data.mob_SubTaskDescription: Pop any bloon spies you see in your friend's city
Data.mob_completionText: Wow, that was awesome. Looks like we showed up at the right time and stopped those bloons in their tracks. Hopefully those guys will have our backs in future.

Data.mob_SubTaskDescription: Complete the special mission to rescue the trapped pilot.
Data.mob_completionText: Good work, soldier! The Pilot has agreed to join our city and teach more troops to fly. Taking helicopters into battle will give us an edge over the bloons.

Data.mob_SubTaskDescription: Paths are found in the decoration menu
Data.mob_completionText: That's much better. Now I can get back to sitting around ignoring complaints.

Data.mob_SubTaskDescription: Complete the special mission to rescue the trapped engineer.
Data.mob_completionText: Those turrets are awesome weapons of mass destruction. Exactly what we need. The bloons are getting stronger but let's see them answer this.

Data.mob_SubTaskDescription: Complete the special mission to find the secret blueprints.
Data.mob_completionText: Like taking blueprints from bloons. I'll hot foot these designs over to our researchers. If anyone knows how to build this weapon, they will.

Data.mob_SubTaskDescription: Complete the special mission to rescue the sunken submarine.
Data.mob_completionText: The captain of the fleet has agreed to join the good fight. Now we'll be unstoppable by land and sea. This battle's in the bag!
It's great to know we have friends who will look out for us. We should send and request supply crates whenever we can.
It's great to know we have friends who will look out for us. We should send and request supply crates whenever we can.
So the legend is true! Endless supplies of City Cash, think of the possibilities. Rumour has it that the city who controls the territory for the longest time over 48 hours will win Bloonstones!
Oh yeah! The bloons will be untying their own knots when we arrive in these bloon bustin' birds. BAM!

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Use the Helipilot in a game.

Data.mob_completionText: Woah! That was even better than I thought. With these turrets in our arsenal we'll be unstoppable.

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Use the Engineer in a game.

Data.mob_completionText: I've never seen anything like it, this Bloonchipper is a bloon's worst nightmare. The scientists are ready to research even more powerful upgrades for it. Slice and dice!

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Use the Bloonchipper in a game.

Data.mob_completionText: Hah! That wiped the smiles right off their shiny little faces. Though technically they never had smiles or faces in the first place, but either way we showed 'em!

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Use the Monkey Sub in a game.

Data.mob_SubTaskDescription: Tiki Torches are found in the decoration menu
Data.mob_completionText: Those Tiki Torches will do nicely, being self sufficient and able to burn for all eternity as they are.

Data.mob_SubTaskDescription: Fences are found in the decoration menu
Data.mob_completionText: Much better! Hopefully now others will follow my lead and take a bit more pride in their surroundings.

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Hold down on a building and then move it.
Data.mob_completionText: Good show, hopefully that should clear up any confusion. Don't forget any building or decoration including paths can be moved but you can't move buildings while they are under construction.
Jīngcǎi! Amazing! Fantastic! I’ve never seen a city look so festive!

Data.mob_SubTaskLabel: Place 1 Year of the Yang Banner

Data.mob_completionText: Mmmm! Smell those cherry blossoms! Good job!
It wasn’t the fearsome Nian at all, just those two monkeys dressed up! Those huàidàn fooled us! Haha!

Data.mob_SubTaskDescription: You can send envelopes from the friends screen.
Data.mob_completionText: Now you’re getting into the festive spirit! Feel free to keep sending these to your friends. I brought plenty!
It looks like your defeat of the Nian was so outstanding that it has impressed the Dragon King! He can remain in your city and ensure that the evil Nian never bothers you again. Well done!

Data.mob_SubTaskDescription: Look for bunnies in your city and tap to catch them.
Data.mob_completionText: Good stuff! Keep looking for more of those pesky thieves and take back my chocolate so we can make the biggest chocolate egg ever. If you help me win I’ll give you the prizes. I’m only in it for the bragging rights anyway.

Data.mob_SubTaskDescription: Choose one of the fireworks and tap to launch.
Data.mob_completionText: Nice job! You can launch one firework for free every day! Of course, you can launch as many extra as you like if you help me pay for them. Fantastic fireworks like these don't come cheap!
